contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.efm8sb1_g.kit.si8051.efm8sb1_slstk2010a.demo.efm8sb1_pwmblinky
contentItem.label: EFM8SB1 PWM Blinky
contentItem.description:
PWM Blinky Example

This example demonstrates the yellow LED using the joystick to control the
LED brightness using PWM.

Joystick 
	Up - Increase brightness
	Down - Decrease brightness

Observe
--------------
STK - LCD and LED

Mode
----------
Any
